trans-unit.resname: PL23·1 | Rabbit Battery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PL23·1 | Rabbit Battery | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+1且具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: PL23·1 | Rabbit Battery | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Reconfigure {R} ({R}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)
trans-unit.target: 重配{R}（{R}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上；或从生物上卸装。重配的时机视同法术。它于贴附期间不是生物。）

trans-unit.resname: PL23·3 | Kwain, Itinerant Meddler | Card Name
PL23·3 | Kwain, Itinerant Meddler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {T}：每位牌手各可以抓一张牌，然后每位以此法抓牌的牌手各获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: PL23·4 | Swiftfoot Boots | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有辟邪与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: PL23·4 | Swiftfoot Boots | Card Text | Paragraph 2
PL23·5 | Ethereal Armor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PL23·5 | Ethereal Armor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control and has first strike.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物具有先攻异能，且你每操控一个结界，它便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: PL23·6 | Arcbound Ravager | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个神器：在能缰吞噬兽上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PL23·6 | Arcbound Ravager | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Modular 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 套件1（此生物进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。当它死去时，你可以将它的+1/+1指示物置于目标神器生物上。）
